code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import jwtDecode from"jwt-decode";import axios from"axios";import{Helmet}from"react-helmet";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Dashboard(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[message,setMessage]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");if(!token)return navigate("/login");try{const decoded=jwtDecode(token);axios.get("http://localhost:8000/api/dashboard/",{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(res=>setMessage(res.data.message));}catch(_unused){navigate("/login");}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Helmet,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("title",{children:"Dashboard - Usuario"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"robots",content:"noindex, nofollow"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:message})]});}
